| Resource    | List                                                |
|-------------|-----------------------------------------------------|
| agent:id    | 000,001,002,003,004,005,006,007,008,009,010,011,012 |


| Actions        | Resources | Allow           | Deny                                |
|----------------|-----------|-----------------|-------------------------------------|
| rootcheck:read | agent:id  | 000,001,003,005 | 002,004,006,007,008,009,010,011,012 |
| rootcheck:run  | agent:id  | 000,001,003,005 | 002,004,006,007,008,009,010,011,012 |
| rootcheck:clear| agent:id  | 000,001,003,005 | 002,004,006,007,008,009,010,011,012 |
